DOC.brief_summary: The study open label , randomize phase 3 study MM-398 without 5-Fluorouracil ( 5-FU ) Leucovorin ( also know folinic acid ) , versus 5-FU leucovorin metastatic pancreatic cancer patient progress prior gemcitabine base therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Study MM-398 With Without 5-FU/LV , Versus 5-FU/LV Patients With Metastatic Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm adenocarcinoma exocrine pancreas Metastatic disease Documented disease progression prior gemcitabine base therapy KPS > /= 70 Adequate bone marrow function Adequate hepatic function Adequate renal function Active CNS metastasis Clinically significant GI disorder Severe arterial thromboembolic event le 6 month inclusion NYHA Class III IV congestive heart failure , ventricular arrhythmia uncontrolled blood pressure Active infection uncontrolled fever Pregnant breast feeding patient
